survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employees' satisfaction and challenges with their digital workspace ergonomics, including hardware, software, and environmental factors affecting productivity and comfort.

questions.question_text: How would you rate your overall satisfaction with your current digital workspace setup?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How would you rate your overall satisfaction with your current digital workspace setup?

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital workspace tools do you use daily? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture the variety of tools used.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice). Include an 'Other' option with a text field.

script.question_text: Which of the following digital workspace tools do you use daily? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you experience discomfort or pain related to your digital workspace setup?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to assess discomfort levels.

script.question_text: How often do you experience discomfort or pain related to your digital workspace setup?

questions.question_text: Which types of discomfort do you experience most often? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Sometimes', 'Often', or 'Always' to Q3
questions.client_notes: Multi-select question to identify common pain points. Include an 'Other' option.

script.question_text: Which types of discomfort do you experience most often? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Sometimes', 'Often', or 'Always' to Q3

questions.question_text: What measures have you taken to improve your digital workspace ergonomics? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select question to understand proactive measures taken by employees.

script.question_text: What measures have you taken to improve your digital workspace ergonomics? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with the ergonomic guidelines provided by your organization?
questions.client_notes: Assess awareness of existing ergonomic guidelines.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with the ergonomic guidelines provided by your organization?

questions.question_text: What additional ergonomic support or resources would you find helpful?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback on unmet needs.

script.question_text: What additional ergonomic support or resources would you find helpful?

questions.question_text: How often do you take breaks to stretch or move during your workday?
questions.client_notes: Frequency scale to assess break habits.

script.question_text: How often do you take breaks to stretch or move during your workday?

questions.question_text: Does your organization provide ergonomic assessments or consultations?
questions.client_notes: Assess availability of ergonomic support services.

script.question_text: Does your organization provide ergonomic assessments or consultations?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in participating in a workshop on digital workspace ergonomics?
questions.client_notes: Measure interest in further education on the topic.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in participating in a workshop on digital workspace ergonomics?
